rules_text:
Create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying. Investigate. [i](To investigate, create a Clue token. It’s an artifact with “{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.”)[/i]
[i]Otherworld[/i] – As long an opponent has been burdened three or more times and this card is in your graveyard, it has flashback {2}{U} [i](You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)[/i]
